scripts.clean: rm -rf release && mkdir release && npm prune && npm install
scripts.version: dot-json extension/manifest.json version $npm_package_version && dot-json extension/manifest.json.chrome version $npm_package_version && dot-json extension/manifest.json.firefox version $npm_package_version
scripts.zip: git archive -o build/lesspass.zip HEAD:extension && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome && rm build/lesspass.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && gulp && npm run zip
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run release-cws && npm run release-amo
